title: Sales Closer
job_overview:
About the Role
We are seeking a highly skilled and charismatic Sales Closer to enroll students into our elite vocal training programs. If you’re passionate about music, love helping people transform, and have a track record of closing high-ticket offers — this role is for you.

Responsibilities
• ? Finalizing Sales: Conduct Zoom/phone calls with qualified leads to close enrollment into our premium programs
• ? Customer Relationship Management: Build rapport and guide prospects with empathy and expertise
• ? Objection Handling: Address concerns, clarify program value, and move prospects toward a confident “yes”
• ? Problem Solving: Customize solutions for each prospect based on their goals and situation
• ? Sales Documentation: Maintain accurate records of calls, sales, objections, and CRM updates
• ? Follow-ups: Stay on top of warm leads, pending payments, or postponed decisions

What We’re Looking For
• ???? Excellent English fluency with polished verbal and written communication
• ???? Proven sales experience, especially in coaching, education, or high-ticket programs
• ???? Active listener with emotional intelligence and persuasive communication
• ???? Sharp, solution-oriented mindset with the ability to think on your feet
• ???? Confidence, charisma, and presence — people should feel your belief in our offer
• ???? Self-motivated to reach targets without constant supervision
• ???? Passion for vocal training, music, or the performing arts is a strong plus
• ???? Familiarity with digital CRMs, sales tracking, and performance reporting tools
